member.name: T:Xamarin.UITest.Android.AndroidApp
member.summary: Represents a running Android application.

member.name: T:Xamarin.UITest.IApp
member.summary: Represents the main gateway to interact with an app. This interface contains shared functionality between and .

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.IApp.Query(System.Func{Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery,Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery})
member.summary: Queries view objects using the fluent API. Defaults to only return view objects that are visible.
member.param: Entry point for the fluent API to specify the element. If left as null returns all visible view objects.
member.returns: An array representing the matched view objects.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.IApp.Query(System.Func{Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery,Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppWebQuery})
member.summary: Queries web view objects using the fluent API. Defaults to only return view objects that are visible.
member.param: Entry point for the fluent API to specify the element. If left as null returns all visible view objects.
member.returns: An array representing the matched view objects.

member.summary: Queries properties on view objects using the fluent API.
member.param: Entry point for the fluent API to specify the type of the property.

member.summary: Enters text into a matching element that supports it.
member.param: Entry point for the fluent API to specify the element.
The text to enter.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.IApp.WaitFor(System.Func{System.Boolean},System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Generic wait function that will repeatly call the predicate function until it returns true. Throws a if the predicate is not fullfilled within the time limit.
member.param: Predicate function that should return true when waiting is complete.
The message used in the .
The to wait before failing.
The to wait between each call to the predicate.
The final to wait after the predicate returns true.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.IApp.WaitForElement(System.Func{Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery,Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery},System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Wait function that will repeatly query the app until a matching element is found. Throws a if no element is found within the time limit.
member.param: Entry point for the fluent API to specify the element.
The message used in the .
The to wait before failing.
The to wait between each query call to the app.
The final to wait after the element has been found.
member.returns: An array representing the matched view objects.

member.param: Entry point for the fluent API to specify the element.
The message used in the .
The to wait before failing.
The to wait between each query call to the app.
The final to wait after the element has been found.
member.returns: An array representing the matched view objects.

member.summary: Wait function that will repeatly query the app until a matching element is no longer found. Throws a if the element is visible at the end of the time limit.

The to wait before failing.
The to wait between each query call to the app.
The final to wait after the element is no longer visible.

member.returns: The screenshot file.

member.name: T:Xamarin.UITest.Utils.IFluentInterface
member.summary: Interface that is used to build fluent interfaces and hides methods declared by from IntelliSense.
member.remarks:
Code that consumes implementations of this interface should expect one of two things:
When referencing the interface from within the same solution (project reference), you will still see the methods this interface is meant to hide.
When referencing the interface through the compiled output assembly (external reference), the standard Object methods will be hidden as intended.
See http://bit.ly/ifluentinterface for more information.

member.summary: Generic wait function that will repeatly call the predicate function until it returns true. Throws a if the predicate is not fullfilled within the time limit.
member.param: Predicate function that should return true when waiting is complete.
The message used in the .
The to wait before failing.
The to wait between each call to the predicate.
The final to wait after the predicate returns true.

member.summary: Wait function that will repeatly query the app until a matching element is found. Throws a if no element is found within the time limit.
member.param: Entry point for the fluent API to specify the element.
The message used in the .
The to wait before failing.
The to wait between each query call to the app.
The final to wait after the element has been found.
member.returns: An array representing the matched view objects.

member.param: Entry point for the fluent API to specify the element.
The message used in the .
The to wait before failing.
The to wait between each query call to the app.
The final to wait after the element is no longer visible.

member.summary: Part of the fluent API. Should not be used directly.

member.summary: Enables debug logging from the test runner.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.EnableLocalScreenshots
member.summary: Enables local screenshot saving. Always enabled in the cloud.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.DeviceIp(System.String)
member.summary: Configures the ip address of the device. Generally best left unset unless you are running an iOS application on a physical device.

member.summary: Configures the zipped app bundle to use. Will force a run on simulator.
member.param: Path to the directory containing the zipped app bundle.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.InstalledApp(System.String)
member.summary: Configures the installed app to use. Will force a run on physical device. Ip address of the device should also be provided.
member.param: The bundle id of the installed application.

member.summary: Builds the configuration and launches the app on the selected device or simulator.
member.returns: The to use in the tests.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.ConnectToApp
member.summary: Builds the configuration and connects to an already running app. Used for advanced scenarios. Regular users should use instead.
member.returns: The to use in the tests.

member.param: The start action for the configuration. See and methods.
member.returns: An which can used for input for .

member.summary: Enables debug logging from the test runner.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.EnableLocalScreenshots
member.summary: Enables local screenshot saving. Always enabled in the cloud.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.DeviceIp(System.String)
member.summary: Configures the ip address of the device. Generally best left unset unless you are running an iOS application on a physical device.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.DevicePort(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configures the port of the device. Generally best left unset.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.DeviceSerial(System.String)
member.summary: Configures the adb serial of the device. Generally best left unset unless you want to run a specific device.
member.param: The device serial from adb devices.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.KeyStore(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Configures the keystore that the provided apk file is signed with. A keystore is not required, but will ensure that the apk file is pristine and unchanged. If a keystore is provided, it will be used to sign the auxiliary apks installed along with the app on the device. If a keystore is not provided, Xamarin.UITest will generate a keystore and resign the apk.
member.param: Path to the keystore file.
Password to the keystore. Corresponds to the -storepass argument in jarsigner.
Password to the matching private key in the keystore. Corresponds to the -keypass argument in jarsigner.
Alias to the key in the keystore. Corresponds to the alias argument in jarsigner.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.SigningInfoFile(System.String)
member.summary: Configures the signing info file that the test server will be "signed" with. A signing info file is not required, but can be used instead of a keystore for signing the test server. The signing info file can be freely shared without the risk of leaking keying material. The signing info file can be generated using the console tool.
member.param: Path to the signing info file.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.ApkFile(System.String)
member.summary: Configures the apk file to use.
member.param: Path to the apk file.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.StartApp
member.summary: Builds the configuration and launches the app on the selected device.
member.returns: The to use in the tests.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.ConnectToApp
member.summary: Builds the configuration and connects to an already running app. Used for advanced scenarios. Regular users should use instead.
member.returns: The to use in the tests.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.GetConfiguration(Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.StartAction)
member.summary: Builds the Android app configuration which can be used for input for . The and methods should be used instead unless you have specific needs for the configuration.
member.param: The start action for the configuration. See and methods.
member.returns: An which can used for input for .

member.name: T:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.GenericAppConfigurator
member.summary: Represents the generic specific part of the fluent API. Should not be used directly.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.GenericAppConfigurator.Debug
member.summary: Enables debug logging from the test runner.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.GenericAppConfigurator.EnableLocalScreenshots
member.summary: Enables local screenshot saving. Always enabled in the cloud.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.GenericAppConfigurator.DeviceIp(System.String)
member.summary: Configures the ip address of the device. Generally best left unset unless you are running an iOS application on a physical device.
member.param: The ip address of the device.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.GenericAppConfigurator.DevicePort(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configures the port of the device. Generally best left unset.
member.param: The port of the Calabash HTTP server on the device.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.GenericAppConfigurator.GetConfiguration
member.summary: Builds the generic app configuration which contains the shared configuration across platforms. The or properties should be used instead as part of the fluent API unless the configuration is needed.
member.returns: An to be consumed by the platform specific configurations.

member.name: P:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.GenericAppConfigurator.iOS
member.summary: Specifies that the app is an iOS app.

member.name: P:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.GenericAppConfigurator.Android
member.summary: Specifies that the app is an Android app.

member.name: T:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery
member.summary: Fluent query API for specifying view elements to match for queries and gestures.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.#ctor(Xamarin.UITest.Queries.QueryPlatform)
member.summary: Initial constructor for queries. Should not be called directly, but used as part of the fluent API in the app classes.
member.param: The query target platform.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.#ctor(Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery,System.Object[])
member.summary: Constructor for adding more tokens to an existing query in an immutable fashion. Takes the tokens from the old query plus the additional tokens.
member.param: The existing query.
The new query tokens.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.Button(System.String)
member.summary: Matches a button. For Android: An element that has class (or inherits from) android.widget.Button. For iOS: An element with class UIButton.
member.param: Optional argument for matching using marked classification. See for more.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.Class(System.String)
member.summary: Matches element class. For Android: An element which has a class (or super class) name that ends with the value (case insensitive). For iOS (first char lowercase): An element that has the class (or super class) name of the given value prepended with "UI". Example: button becomes UIButton. For iOS (first char uppercase): An element that has the class (or super class) name of the given value.
member.param: The class name to match.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.ClassFull(System.String)
member.summary: Matches element class. For Android: An element with the given fully quantified class (or super class) name. For iOS: An element that has the class (or super class) name of the given value.
member.param: The class name to match.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.Marked(System.String)
member.summary: Matches common values. For Android: An element with the given value as either id, contentDescription or text. For iOS: An element with the given value as either accessibilityLabel or accessibilityId.
member.param: The value to match.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.Id(System.String)
member.summary: Matches element id. For Android: An element with the given value as id. For iOS: An element with the given value as accessibilityId.
member.param: The value to match.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.Sibling(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the query to return sibling elements of the currently matched ones.
member.param: Optional class name of elements to match.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.Descendant(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the query to return descendant elements of the currently matched ones.
member.param: Optional class name of elements to match.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.Parent(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the query to return parent elements of the currently matched ones.
member.param: Optional class name of elements to match.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.Child(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the query to return child elements of the currently matched ones.
member.param: Optional class name of elements to match.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.All(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the query to return all elements instead of just the visible ones.
member.param: Optional class name of elements to match.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.Text(System.String)
member.summary: Matches element text.
member.param: The value to match.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.Index(System.Int32)
member.summary: Matches the nth element of the currently matched elements.
member.param: The zero-based index of the element to match.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Queries.AppQuery.Raw(System.String)
member.summary: A raw Calabash selector. Allows for string based Calabash queries.
member.param: The Calabash query to match.
